name: jobcrawl
description: Intelligent job application assistant with AI-powered cover letter generation

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm ci && cd ../backend && npm ci
